detail_desc: Cap in a cotton blend with a small embroidered detail and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Short dress in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons down the front and a wide, frill-trimmed square neckline with concealed elastication. Elasticated seam under the bust and short puff sleeves with a small frill trim.

Lightweight coat in nylon with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Stand-up collar, hood and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Sandals with square toes, covered block heels and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front, leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with narrow, rounded shoulder straps.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with flounced trims, a wrapover top, concealed press-stud at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Sturdy shopper in braided seagrass decorated with tassels and shell-shaped plastic beads at the front. Two imitation leather handles. Unlined. Depth 15 cm. Width 36 cm. Height 32.5 cm.
Long-sleeved sports top in printed cotton jersey with side panels, ventilation holes in the armpits and slits at the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft cable-knit wool blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with elasticated tops.

Trousers in soft washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, zipped side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, shaped legs with stitching on the knees and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, frill-trimmed bib front and covered button band. Wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Earrings in plastic and metal decorated with faceted plastic beads. Size approx. 3.5x5 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length trousers in an airy rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Purl-knit polo shirt in marled cotton with a collar, button placket, short sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Small, decorative eyelets around the neckline and cuffs.
Rib-knit cardigan in a viscose and nylon blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined swimsuit in UV-protective material with a textured finish. Zip down the front with a chin guard and 3/4-length sleeves. UPF 50.
Flat sandals with wide crossover foot straps and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Tailored trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a small front pocket, fake back pockets and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Slim legs with creases and a flare to the hem..
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges. No fasteners.
Joggers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt with box pleats for added width.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Knee-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with a V-shaped opening at the front and ties at the neckline. Gathered seam at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back.

Running trousers in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, a concealed key pocket in the waistband, a zip at the hems, and reflective details. Regular fit.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif front and back and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft double-weave organic cotton with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small, gathered collar and V-shaped opening at the top. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a narrow detachable belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Trousers in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy, and wide, straight legs.
Suede sock boots with block heels and a narrow, ankle-height shaft with a zip at the back. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey with stripes in glittery thread, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and short slits at the hem.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace. Opening cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width 6 cm.
Gym bag in woven fabric with a reflective finish that can also be worn as a backpack. Zip at the top, narrow shoulder straps and one inner pocket. Size 34.5x44 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).

Thin parka in a cotton weave with a detachable lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, drawstring at the waist, flap pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and a single back vent. Lined.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a button placket and a braided, detachable belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated, embroidered, lace-trimmed tops.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the top with an overlocked edge, and wide smocking at the hem.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey sewn in a double layer with openings in the lower layer for easier nursing access.

Calf-length, A-line skirt in woven fabric with box pleats front and back and a high waist with covered elastication at the back and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, concealed buttons at the top, and a decorative button band down the front. Unlined.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist and covered buttons down the front. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Sleeveless top in stretch jersey with a round neckline, concealed buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Gloves in soft fleece. Ribbed cuffs with a glittery stripe at the top.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frills at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Seam at the waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey containing some silk in a relaxed fit.
Mules with open toes, faux fur crossover straps at the top, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a patterned cotton weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and a back pocket.
